applicant-name.name: SHENZHEN QIANYI HYDROGEN ENERGY CO LTD
深圳市千懿氢能有限责任公司

invention-title: Internal humidifying fuel cell with metal bipolar plate
一种金属双极板内增湿燃料电池

abstract.p: The invention discloses an internal humidifying fuel cell with a metal bipolar plate, which is characterized in that according to the humidifying and draining characteristic requirements of a fuel cell membrane electrode, micropores are processed on the metal bipolar plate by adopting laser, the parameters such as porosity, aperture, pore distribution and the like are accurately designed, the process is controllable, and the arrangement is orderly. In the working process of the battery, circulating water of the metal bipolar plate permeates into a gas flow channel on the other side through pores through coordinated control over the flow speed and pressure of circulating water and gas, dry gas is humidified and permeates and wets a membrane electrode under the action of concentration gradient, and meanwhile, generated liquid water permeates into the membrane electrode through the action of pressure gradient and capillary action. And the water permeates to the circulating water side from the diffusion layer of the membrane electrode and the micropores of the metal bipolar plate and is discharged along with the circulating water, so that the water content of the membrane electrode is dynamically regulated in two directions, the dual functions of humidifying and water discharging are realized, the stability of the cell is improved, the electrochemical corrosion of the metal bipolar plate is reduced, and an auxiliary system of the fuel cell is simplified.

本发明公开了一种金属双极板内增湿燃料电池，提出根据燃料电池膜电极的增湿、排水的特性要求，在金属双极板上，采用激光加工微孔，并对孔隙率、孔径、及孔隙分布等参数进行精确设计，工艺可控，排列有序。在电池工作中，通过对循环水与气体的流速、压力的协调控制，使金属双极板的循环水通过孔隙渗透到另一侧的气体流道中，对干燥气体进行增湿，在浓度梯度的作用下，渗透、侵湿膜电极，同时，生成的液态水通过压力梯度作用和毛细作用，从膜电极的扩散层、金属双极板的微孔渗透到循环水侧，随循环水排出，起到对膜电极含水量动态的双向调节，实现增湿与排水的双重作用，既提高电池的稳定性，减小金属双极板的电化学腐蚀，又简化燃料电池的辅助系统。
